content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 16}, {"type": "light_gray_carpet", "quantity": 46, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 28}, {"type": "golden_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 55, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a spruce_wood, I need to move a spruce_log from slot 28 to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "light_blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 53, "index": 16}, {"type": "light_gray_carpet", "quantity": 46, "index": 19}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "shield", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "golden_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "beetroot_seeds", "quantity": 46, "index": 36}, {"type": "oak_sapling", "quantity": 3, "index": 38}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 55, "index": 44}]

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
